meanings.definition: A building or structure for housing boats.
meanings.sent1: The boathouses along the river were painted blue and white.
meanings.sent2: We rented one of the boathouses for the summer to keep our canoe safe.
meanings.sent3: The boathouses had a party and invited all the boats for a dance.
meanings.sent4: The boathouses stood like guardians, protecting the boats from the storm.
meanings.sent5: The boathouses were filled with the smell of saltwater and adventure.

meanings.sent1: Many boathouses lined the shore, each painted a different color.
meanings.sent2: The boathouses were old and weathered, but full of character.
meanings.sent3: The boathouses decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The boathouses stood together like a family, united in their purpose.
meanings.sent5: The boathouses whispered stories of the sea to the passing boats.
